name: Wolf hunters
description:
A story about Little Red Riding Hood. A small shooter with narrative scenes.

Made by:

  • Juanxo  - @JuanGarciaBone - Modelling, texturing and 2D.
  • Adrián - @biakuray - Modelling, rigging and animation.
  • Alex - @atcolombini - Programming, not sleeping and drinking coffee.

A little draft of the game, not yet finished, it was made for the Yuri Game Jam 2017, we plan on finishing in the following days/weeks.
